name: Shimbabwe: A Global Journey
description:
It's a platformer game where your character changes based on what platform it's on. There are 4 levels total with some commentary in between that may or may not be helpful.

You can play the online version at: https://bobjrsenior.pw/games/shimbabwe/

Source: https://github.com/bobjrsenior/shimbabwe/tree/master/Shimbabwe
